scriptLines: CHANGEDATE = iifNull(toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS'), toTimestamp('1900-01-01 00:00:00','yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss'), toTimestamp(substring(CHANGEDATE, 1, 23), 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ss.SSS')),

query: 'SELECT ASSETNUM,ASSETTAG,LOCATION,SITEID,ORGID,DESCRIPTION AS ASSET_DESCRIPTION,INSTALLDATE AS INSTALL_DATE\nFROM MXMSTG.STG_ASSET',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID ,O.ORGANIZATION_NM,S.SITE_NM
FROM
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
S.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID
',
query: 'SELECT ASSETNUM,ASSETTAG,LOCATION,SITEID,ORGID,DESCRIPTION AS ASSET_DESCRIPTION,INSTALLDATE AS INSTALL_DATE\nFROM MXMSTG.STG_ASSET',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID ,O.ORGANIZATION_NM,S.SITE_NM
FROM
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
S.ORGANIZATION_ID=O.ORGANIZATION_ID
',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',
query: 'SELECT JPNUM AS JP_NUM,DESCRIPTION AS JP_DESC,JPDURATION,STATUS,PRIORITY,JOBPLANID,\nDOWNTIME,LABORCODE,PLUSCREVNUM,SITEID,ORGID FROM MXMSTG.STG_JOBPLAN',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE O.ORGANIZATION_ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID',

query: 'SELECT O.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID,O.ORGANIZATION_NM AS ORGANIZATION_NM, S.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.SITE_NM AS SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE O.ORGANIZATION_ID = S.ORGANIZATION_ID',

query: 'SELECT 
WO.WONUM AS WONUM,WO.PARENT AS PARENT,GOVTWONUM,WO.ORGID,WO.SITEID,LOCATION,WS.STATUS AS STATUS,ASSETNUM,JPNUM, WS.CHANGEDATE AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,
WORKTYPE,TASKID,ISTASK, DESCRIPTION,PLUSCJPREVNUM,WOPRIORITY,WO.CHANGEDATE AS WO_CHANGEDATE,STATUSDATE,WS.CHANGEBY AS WO_STATUS_CHANGEBY, PMDUEDATE,
TARGSTARTDATE,TARGCOMPDATE,REPORTDATE,ACTLABHRS,ACTSTART, ACTFINISH,ACTINTLABHRS,ESTDUR,WOGROUP,PERSONGROUP,OWNERGROUP,PLUSCFREQUENCY,PLUSCFREQUNIT,
PMNEXTDUEDATE,PMNUM
FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO, MXMSTG.STG_WOSTATUS WS
 WHERE
 WS.WONUM=WO.WONUM
 AND WS.ORGID=WO.ORGID
 AND WS.SITEID=WO.SITEID',
query: 'SELECT ASSET_ID,ASSETNUM AS ASSETNUM_ref,SITE_ID AS SITE_ID_ref FROM MXMDW.ASSET',

query: 'SELECT PERSON_ID,PERSON_NBR,P.SITE_ID AS SITE_ID,S.ORGANIZATION_ID AS ORGANIZATION_ID FROM 
MXMDW.PERSON P,
MXMDW.ORGANIZATION O,
MXMDW.SITE S
WHERE
O.ORGANIZATION_ID =S.ORGANIZATION_ID
AND S.SITE_ID=P.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID>0',

query: 'SELECT L.LOCATION_ID AS LOCATION_ID,L.LOCATION AS DIM_LOCATION,L.DESCRIPTION AS LOCATION_DESC, S.SITE_NM AS LOC_SITE_NM
FROM MXMDW.LOCATIONS L
INNER JOIN MXMDW.SITE S
ON S.SITE_ID = L.SITE_ID',
query: 'SELECT OPERATION_ID, WONUM,SITE_ID,STATUS,WO_STATUS_CHANGEDATE,SNAPSHOT_DATE FROM MXMDW.OPERATION WHERE CURRENT_RECORD_IND=1',
query: 'SELECT WONUM AS RefWONUM,S.SITE_ID AS RefSITE_ID,STATUS AS RefSTATUS,STATUSDATE AS RefSTATUSDATE,\'1\' AS FLAG FROM MXMSTG.STG_WORKORDER WO,MXMDW.SITE S\nWHERE\nWO.SITEID=S.SITE_NM',
query: 'SELECT JP_ID,JP_NUM,SITE_ID AS JPRef_SITE_ID,ORGANIZATION_ID AS JPRef_ORGANIZATION_ID FROM MXMDW.JOBPLAN WHERE STATUS=\'ACTIVE\' AND SITE_ID<0',
